participant_1.background:
I usually wake up early, eat a quick breakfast, and review my classes before heading out the door.
I loved playing outside with my friends and riding my bike.
I love the feeling of creating something beautiful, and I find that jewelry design is a great way to express my creativity.
i love to read books.
I like to dye my hair a variety of colors, but my favorite is a dark shade of teal.

i do not have a good social life.
i have a pug named corky.
i have made over 90 , 000 on trifecta bets alone this year.

content.text: Hello, how are you doing today?
Good, good.  How are you doing?
I am doing well.  What are your hobbies?
I like to play video games, watch sports, and collect Celtics memorabilia.
I like to read books and play board games.  I love to dye my hair a variety of colors.  What is your favorite color?
I like teal the best.  What is your favorite book?
My favorite book is The Hobbit.  It's a great fantasy novel about a hobbit named Bilbo Baggins who goes on an adventure with 13 dwarves and a wizard.
I've never read it, but I've heard good things about it.  I'm not really into fantasy novels, but I like science fiction.
I've read a few science fiction novels, but I don't read them as often as I read fantasy novels.  I'm not really into sports, but I do enjoy watching football games.
Football is my favorite sport to watch.  I'm a big fan of the New England Patriots.
I'm not a big fan of the Patriots, but I do like watching Tom Brady play.  He's a great quarterback.
He is, he's one of the best players in the NFL.  I'm glad you're a fan of reading.  It's a great hobby.
Thank you, I think so too.  It's a great way to escape from the real world and explore new worlds.
I agree.  I love getting lost in a good book.
